description.value:
Trigger The @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dying] condition of an ally you're observing would increase.

Even death halts in the face of your power. Spend a Mythic Point; the triggering ally loses the dying condition, their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] condition doesn't increase, and they heal a number of Hit Points equal to @Damage[(2*@actor.level)[healing]]{twice your level}.
